data.name: Cfg_ConfigYaml
data.value: This file contains global configuration for the game. Paths, Dmd, Audio, Modes.

data.name: GameFolder
data.value: SkeletonGame path

data.name: Tip_Attract
data.value: Todo

data.name: Tip_AudioStreamingLoad
data.value: Disabling will load into memory. (Only compatible with music). If using lots of music it's probably best to disable streaming load.

data.name: Tip_BallSearch
data.value: Enables/Disables the BallSearch Mode.

data.name: Tip_BallSearchDelay
data.value: How long to wait for a ball search to start.

data.name: Tip_BonusTally
data.value: Enables/Disables the Bonus mode.

data.name: Tip_CoilBallSearch
data.value: Coils tagged for ballsearch are fired when the ball has not been seen or at the start of the game when all balls can't be found so these coils are coils that help return the ball to the trough. NOTE: trough should NOT be tagged for ballsearch since firing the # trough would not help fill the trough...Add the tag autoPlunger to a coil to support autoplunging on ball save.

data.name: Tip_CoilFlashTable
data.value: This view allows you to configure all the coils/flashers in a machine. Coils in the table must have a name to be exported to yaml and will be skipped if NOT USED. The SolenoidType isn't needed for pyprocgame but just as extra options for reference.

data.name: Tip_DmdBordered
data.value: Shows a border around the window. (F11 toggles window border and F12 will save position when window is running).

data.name: Tip_DmdFlipped
data.value: Flips the display. Options are 0, 1, 2, 3.

data.name: Tip_DmdFramerate
data.value: The displays framerate.

data.name: Tip_DmdFullScreen
data.value: Full-screen mode scales the contents to fit the full display; may not look right.

data.name: Tip_DmdGrid
data.value: Where to find the dmdgrid32x32.png file.

data.name: Tip_DmdPosition
data.value: Sets the displays position.

data.name: Tip_DmdResolution
data.value: Display resolution. Shouldn't be changed after doing work to a game.

data.name: Tip_DmdScale
data.value: The display scale is the multiplier per dot. At 5 each dot is 5x5 pixels.

data.name: Tip_DropFilesInfo
data.value: Drop files to copy.

data.name: Tip_EnablePlayback
data.value: Enabled game recording plaback. This will set the FakePinProc class to use the Playback version and set back when game is closed. The selected playback in the list will be copied to the main game directory as playback.txt.

data.name: Tip_EnableRecording
data.value: Enabled game recording. This will set the skeletons base class to BasicGameRecordable and set it back providing the game window is closed before the UI. Recordings are saved to the recordings directory.

data.name: Tip_ExportLampshowUI
data.value: Exports all the lamps into a compatible rampantslug LampshowUI project.

data.name: Tip_ExportPythonSwitchCallbacks
data.value: Exports a python file that contains active switch method callbacks. All switches in the machine are exported except for the trough and dedicated switches.

data.name: Tip_FileOptionInfo
data.value: Double clicking opens with default process.

data.name: Tip_GameLaunchInfo
data.value: Launches the game with your default python install.

data.name: Tip_LampMatrix
data.value: This view allows you to configure all the lamps in a machine. Lamps must have a name to be exported to yaml and will be skipped if NOT USED. Some tags are needed for Skeleton game. Noteably; shoot_again (Used for ball save).

data.name: Tip_LaunchRecording
data.value: Launches the game with the options set.

data.name: Tip_MachineYaml
data.value: This file contains all the configuration for a machine.

data.name: Tip_OpenDir
data.value: Opens the current directory.

data.name: Tip_OSC
data.value: Enables an OSC server which listens for switches pushed from a UI. eg SwitchMatrix Gui.

data.name: Tip_PathsDmd
data.value: Asset manager path for display files. Images, movie, .dmd.

data.name: Tip_PathsHdFonts
data.value: Asset manager path for fonts. .ttf.

data.name: Tip_PathsSdlPath
data.value: The display uses SDL2. The Dlls path is the needed SDL2 Dlls.

data.name: Tip_PathsSfx
data.value: Asset manager for the sfx dir.

data.name: Tip_PathsSound
data.value: Asset manager path for the parent Sound folder.

data.name: Tip_PathsVoice
data.value: Asset manager path for the parent Voice folder.

data.name: Tip_PathsVpGameMap
data.value: The is where the vp_game_map.yaml can be found. This is more of a globally used path, not per game.

data.name: Tip_Profiles
data.value: Enables a profile menu players where players can create & select players.

data.name: Tip_SaveAssetsFile
data.value: Saves the asset_list.yaml.

data.name: Tip_SaveConfigGame
data.value: Overwrites the config.yaml in the current game folder.

data.name: Tip_SaveConfigMachine
data.value: Overwrites the machine.yaml in the games config folder.

data.name: Tip_SaveScoreDisplayConfig
data.value: Overwrites the new_score_display.yaml in the games config folder.

data.name: Tip_SaveSequences
data.value: Saves the sequence file that's in view.

data.name: Tip_SeqAnimation
data.value: An animation layer, no text.

data.name: Tip_SeqCombo
data.value: A multi-line text layer and animation Combo.

data.name: Tip_SeqCredits
data.value: A static animation with a moving image(credit scroll) that scrolls over animation.

data.name: Tip_SeqGroupLayer
data.value: Groups multiple display layers together.

data.name: Tip_SeqHighScores
data.value: Displays the high scores.

data.name: Tip_SeqLastScores
data.value: Displays the last games scores.

data.name: Tip_SeqMarkupLayer
data.value: Has a Bold # and Normal [ font. eg: # Left, Right #, # Center # [ Left, Right ], [ Center ].

data.name: Tip_SeqMoveLayer
data.value: Moves an animation or text.

data.name: Tip_SeqPanningLayer
data.value: ToDo

data.name: Tip_SeqParticleLayer
data.value: Displays particle emitters in a layer.

data.name: Tip_SeqRandomText
data.value: Create a list of sentences to display at random when this layer is used.

data.name: Tip_SeqScriptedText
data.value: Runs a script of text lists. Duration is how long each text list will be displayed. If an animation is set to play with the layers and the duration of the animation is longer than the text script, then the duration is set to let the whole animtion finish.

data.name: Tip_SeqTextLayer
data.value: A text layer with no animation.

data.name: Tip_ServiceMenu
data.value: Enables/Disables the Service Mode Menu.

data.name: Tip_SwitchMatrix
data.value: This view allows you configure the switches. Switches must have a name to be exported to yaml and will be skipped if NOT USED. Don't use spaces in names, use the label. Some tags are needed for Skeleton game. Noteably; shooter, trough, early_save.

data.name: Tip_TiltConfig
data.value: Enables/Disables the Tilt mode.

data.name: Tip_Trophys
data.value: Enables a mode that displays trophys when complete. See the trophy_default_data.

data.name: Tip_VPExportSolenoid
data.value: Export VP_Coil.txt - all the coils into Visual Pinball 'SolCallBacks'. Creates Sub routines for the Solenoid callback and a list of SolCallBacks. Flippers should be skipped from this process.

data.name: Tip_VPExportSwitch
data.value: Export VP_Switch.txt - all the switches into Visual Pinball switch hits. Creates Sub routines for switches and these can be copied into a tables script.

data.name: Tip_DmdOnTop
data.value: Raises the window above every other window. Good for Visual Pinball or always having the display in view.
